paper.title: A Deep Convolutional Neural Network Based Risk Identification Method for E-Commerce Supply Chain Finance
paper.abstract: With the popularity of the Internet, the rise of e-commerce platforms has led to the rapid development of supply chain (SC) financial services in China, and the competitiveness of commercial banks and core enterprises in the supply chain is now gradually increasing, rapidly expanding into an important area of competition between the two. As an emerging force rebounding from the economic downturn, e-commerce platform transactions, with their unique characteristics of informatization, diversification, and convenience, have provided a broad space for Internet SC finance. The article mainly analyzes the risk identification method of e-commerce SC finance, analyzes its risk from the financing process, gives corresponding data support for the matters or processes that may cause financing risk based on DCNN model, and takes Jingdong SC finance as an example and analyzes its main financing methods and risk identification process; based on different experimental comparisons, a multigroup experimental study shows that the accuracy of supply chain finance risk identification using deep convolutional neural network models can reach 95.36%, which demonstrates the effectiveness of the proposed method by providing better performance compared to traditional BP and SVM networks.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究使用深度卷积神经网络（DCNN）进行电子商务供应链金融的风险识别，这直接涉及金融风险管理领域。论文明确提到风险识别方法及其在供应链金融中的应用，并通过实验验证了模型在风险识别中的有效性。
